## Defined types

### <a name="githubartifact--install"></a>`githubartifact::install`

The githubartifact::install class.

#### Examples

##### install rpm

```puppet
githubartifact::install { "tools":
  org_name => "fb929",
  repository => "tools",
  releasetag => "v0.0.3",
  package_version => "0.0.3-1",
  pattern => ".noarch.rpm",
  service_notify => false,
}
```

##### <a name="-githubartifact--install--org_name"></a>`org_name`

Data type: `String`

required, name of the organization on github

##### <a name="-githubartifact--install--repository"></a>`repository`

Data type: `String`

required, name of the repository on github

##### <a name="-githubartifact--install--releasetag"></a>`releasetag`

Data type: `String`

required, tag for release

##### <a name="-githubartifact--install--pattern"></a>`pattern`

Data type: `String`

required, pattern for find asset

##### <a name="-githubartifact--install--token"></a>`token`

Data type: `Variant[String,Boolean]`



Default value: `false`

Default value: `undef`

Data type: `Optional[Boolean]`



Default value: `true`
